img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在仰頭爭搶籃板或觀察籃框時協助穩定頭部。高強度防守或切入對抗時，透過穩定下顎與舌骨來輔助呼吸道暢通，避免過度咬牙造成的頸部僵硬。
desc_en: Stabilizes the head when looking up for rebounds or focusing on the rim. Assists in airway patency during high-intensity defense or contact drives by stabilizing the jaw and hyoid, preventing neck stiffness from clenching.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防守時張開雙臂阻斷傳球路線的關鍵肌肉。在投籃動作中負責將手肘抬起至適當高度（外展），以及爭搶籃板時的高手位卡位動作。
desc_en: Key muscle for lifting arms to block passing lanes during defense. Responsible for elevating the elbow (abduction) during the shooting mechanic and maintaining high arm position for rebounding.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 投籃與傳球的主要動力來源。負責將球舉過頭頂（肩屈曲）以及大力胸前傳球。在運球切入對抗時，協助手臂護球與推開防守者。
desc_en: Primary power source for shooting and passing. Responsible for raising the ball overhead (shoulder flexion) and executing strong chest passes. Assists in shielding the ball and warding off defenders during drives.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 抓下籃板球後用力「扯下」保護球的關鍵肌群。在背身單打（Post-up）時協助向後頂開對手，以及投籃出手後的煞車穩定。
desc_en: Crucial for forcefully 'ripping down' rebounds to secure the ball. Assists in backing down opponents during post-ups and stabilizing the arm deceleration after a shot release.

img_source: Berichard, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 籃球防守滑步（Defensive Slide）的核心肌群。在低重心寬站距時維持骨盆穩定，並在爆發性側向移動或轉身過人時提供強大的髖伸展力量。
desc_en: Core muscle for the defensive slide. Maintains pelvic stability in a low, wide stance and provides powerful hip extension during explosive lateral movements or spin moves.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 與背闊肌協同，負責搶籃板時的手臂下压動作。在運球轉身或過頂傳球時，協助肱骨的內旋與穩定，對抗禁區內的肢體碰撞。
desc_en: Works with the latissimus dorsi for the arm pull-down motion during rebounding. Assists in humeral internal rotation and stability during spin dribbles or overhead passes, countering physical contact in the paint.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 單手抓球（Palming）的關鍵。負責小指外展以最大化手掌控球面積。在投籃出手瞬間，協助控制球的最後軌跡與旋轉。
desc_en: Key to palming the ball. Abducts the little finger to maximize hand span for ball control. Assists in fine-tuning the ball's trajectory and rotation during the shooting release.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 運球或接球前張開手掌的準備動作。在投籃跟隨動作（Follow-through）中，確保手指伸展指向籃框，維持投籃手型。
desc_en: Prepares the hand opening for dribbling or catching. Ensures finger extension pointing towards the rim during the shooting follow-through, maintaining proper shooting form.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 控球時對球體的抓握力來源。在用力運球（Pound Dribble）或抄截時，提供手指屈曲的力量以控制球的反彈。
desc_en: Source of grip strength for ball handling. Provides finger flexion power to control the ball's rebound during hard pound dribbles or steal attempts.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 形成手掌「杯狀」結構以穩固持球。在單手傳球或投籃托球時，幫助手掌邊緣緊貼球體表面，增加摩擦力與控制性。
desc_en: Forms the 'cupped' palm structure for secure ball holding. Helps the palm edge conform to the ball surface during one-handed passes or the shooting set-point, increasing friction and control.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防止「翻腳刀」的第一道防線。在急停、歐洲步（Euro-step）或側向滑步時，負責擴大足底支撐面並穩定足部外側。
desc_en: First line of defense against ankle sprains. Enlarges the plantar base of support and stabilizes the lateral foot during sudden stops, Euro-steps, or lateral defensive slides.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 投籃準備動作（Set Point）的關鍵。負責肩關節外旋，使前臂能垂直於地面。作為肩袖肌群，在長傳或蓋火鍋時穩定關節防止受傷。
desc_en: Critical for the shooting 'Set Point'. Externally rotates the shoulder to align the forearm vertically. As a rotator cuff muscle, stabilizes the joint during long passes or blocks to prevent injury.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在罰球前的深呼吸調節或暫停恢復時很重要。在激烈的禁區卡位（Boxing Out）中，協助穩定胸廓以承受對手撞擊。
desc_en: Important for breath regulation before free throws or during timeouts. Assists in stabilizing the rib cage to withstand opponent impact during intense boxing out in the paint.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 身體對抗的壓力指標。在禁區肉搏或用力跳躍時常不自覺緊咬。放鬆此肌肉有助於保持投籃時的手感柔和度。
desc_en: Stress indicator during physical contact. Often clenched unconsciously during paint battles or explosive jumps. Relaxing this muscle helps maintain a soft touch for shooting.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 投籃「壓腕（Snap）」動作的穩定器。確保手腕在快速伸展時不向尺側偏移，維持球的飛行軌跡正直。
desc_en: Stabilizer for the shooting 'wrist snap'. Ensures the wrist doesn't deviate ulnarly during rapid extension, maintaining a straight ball flight trajectory.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 強力運球與單手傳球（如棒球式長傳）的動力來源。提供屈腕力量，使球能高速離手。
desc_en: Power source for hard dribbling and one-handed passes (like baseball passes). Provides wrist flexion force to propel the ball at high speed.

img_source: Berichard d'après Gray's anatomy, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助調整腳趾抓地力。在需要爆發性第一步（First Step）切入時，確保屈趾肌力能直線傳遞，提升啟動速度。
desc_en: Assists in toe grip adjustments. Ensures linear transmission of toe flexion force during an explosive 'First Step' drive, enhancing acceleration.

img_source: Selket at English Wikipedia, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 運球時維持手掌朝下（旋前）的主要肌肉。在Cross-over變向運球時，負責快速翻轉前臂以改變球的落點。
desc_en: Primary muscle for maintaining the palm-down (pronated) position while dribbling. Responsible for rapidly flipping the forearm during Crossover moves to change the ball's drop point.

img_source: Polygon data is generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS), CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防守站姿（膝蓋彎曲）下的主要支撐肌。在屈膝狀態下提供跳躍力量，對於搶二次籃板或連續彈跳至關重要，也是預防阿基里斯腱受傷的關鍵。
desc_en: Primary support muscle in the defensive stance (knees bent). Provides jumping power from a flexed knee position, crucial for second jumps/rebounds and preventing Achilles injuries.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 爆發性跳躍與灌籃的動力來源。在搶籃板落地時負責吸收衝擊保護膝蓋（ACL）。快速的離心收縮能力對於防守時的急停變向非常重要。
desc_en: Power source for explosive jumps and dunking. Absorbs impact upon landing to protect the knee (ACL). Rapid eccentric capability is vital for sudden stops and directional changes in defense.

img_source: Image:Gray445.png modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在變向過人（Crossover）時，負責穩定大拇指以對抗側向剪力。透過硬化足弓，為爆發性切入提供穩固的槓桿支點。
desc_en: Stabilizes the big toe against lateral shear forces during Crossovers. Stiffens the arch to provide a solid leverage point for explosive drives.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 籃球員足部的「核心」。在頻繁的急停跳投與側向滑步中，抵抗足外翻（Pronation），防止足弓塌陷與足底筋膜炎。
desc_en: The 'core' of the basketballer's foot. Resists excessive pronation during frequent pull-up jumpers and lateral slides, preventing arch collapse and plantar fasciitis.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 用力抓球（Grip）的關鍵力量。在爭搶籃板球或抄截時，負責將大拇指用力扣向手掌，確保球權不被拍掉。
desc_en: Key strength for gripping the ball. Responsible for clamping the thumb towards the palm during rebounds or steals, ensuring ball retention against strips.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 持球「三威脅（Triple Threat）」姿勢時，協助張開虎口以穩固持球。在投籃出手後，維持大拇指的自然伸展。
desc_en: Helps open the web space for secure ball holding in the 'Triple Threat' position. Maintains natural thumb extension after the shooting release.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防守滑步與旋轉動作的穩定器。在膝蓋彎曲時負責外旋，防止落地時膝蓋內扣（Dynamic Valgus），是預防ACL撕裂最重要的肌肉之一。
desc_en: Stabilizer for defensive slides and pivoting. Externally rotates the flexed knee, preventing knee collapse (dynamic valgus) upon landing; critical for ACL tear prevention.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 籃球員膝蓋的保護神。在頻繁的跳躍落地與急停動作中，負責將髕骨向內拉以維持軌跡穩定，預防跳躍膝（Jumper's Knee）與髕股關節疼痛。
desc_en: Guardian of the basketball player's knee. Pulls the patella medially to maintain tracking during frequent landings and sudden stops, preventing Jumper's Knee and patellofemoral pain.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 垂直起跳（Vertical Jump）的主要推力來源。作為股四頭肌最大部分，負責吸收落地時的巨大衝擊力，並在防守深蹲時提供持續支撐。
desc_en: Primary driver for the Vertical Jump. As the largest quad muscle, it absorbs massive landing impacts and provides sustained support during deep defensive stances.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責起跳前的下蹲（髖屈）與空中的踢腿動作。在快攻衝刺時，負責快速提膝以增加步幅。是連接爆發力與速度的雙關節肌。
desc_en: Handles the loading phase (hip flexion) before a jump and leg extension in the air. Drives rapid knee lift during fast break sprints. A biarticular muscle linking power and speed.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 投籃發力時負責肱骨頭的動態穩定。在用力過頂傳球（Overhead Pass）或快速抄截時，保護肩關節前側不脫位。
desc_en: Provides dynamic humeral head stability during shooting power generation. Protects against anterior shoulder dislocation during forceful overhead passes or rapid steal attempts.

img_source: Bildbearbetning: sv:Användare:Chrizz, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 投籃準備動作（Set Point）時負責屈肘至90度。在搶籃板或爭球時，負責將球強行拉入懷中保護（Chinning the ball）。
desc_en: Flexes the elbow to 90 degrees for the shooting 'Set Point'. Responsible for forcefully pulling the ball into the chest (Chinning) to protect it during rebounds or loose ball scrums.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 投籃最後階段「推球」的精確控制肌。負責穩定的肘部伸展，確保近距離投籃或罰球的力量輸出平穩。
desc_en: Precision control muscle for the final 'push' in shooting. Responsible for stable elbow extension, ensuring smooth power output for mid-range shots or free throws.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 三分球與長傳的爆發力來源。在需要快速伸臂封蓋（Block）或強力胸前傳球時提供高強度的收縮力量。
desc_en: Power source for 3-pointers and long passes. Provides high-intensity contraction for rapid shot blocking or powerful chest passes.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助過頂傳球與搶籃板動作。因跨越肩關節，在手臂高舉過頭的姿勢下（如投籃準備期）會被伸展，儲存彈性位能以增加出手力量。
desc_en: Assists in overhead passes and rebounding. Crossing the shoulder joint, it is stretched when arms are raised (like in shooting prep), storing elastic energy to boost release power.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助運球時的前臂姿勢維持。在快速變向運球（Crossover）時，幫助穩定肘關節以承受球的回彈力。
desc_en: Maintains forearm posture during dribbling. Stabilizes the elbow to withstand ball impact forces during rapid Crossover moves.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 切入過人時的關鍵肌。在變向動作中負責快速將後腿向前內收帶動身體。頻繁的橫向煞車與變速易導致此處拉傷。
desc_en: Key muscle for driving past defenders. Adducts the trailing leg rapidly to propel the body during directional changes. Frequent lateral braking and speed changes make it prone to strain.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 起跳動作的推進器。負責將第一蹠骨壓向地板，轉化為向上的垂直力量。同時在著地時穩定足踝，防止翻船。
desc_en: Propulsion engine for jumping. Depresses the first metatarsal against the floor to generate vertical force. Also stabilizes the ankle upon landing to prevent sprains.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 投籃動作中負責「送球」與肩胛骨上旋，確保手臂能順暢舉過頭頂。在傳球與防守推人時，負責穩定肩胛骨。
desc_en: Responsible for the 'follow-through' push and scapular upward rotation in shooting, allowing smooth overhead arm movement. Stabilizes the scapula during passing and defensive pushing.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 搶籃板與禁區卡位的力量來源。在爭球時將手臂用力向下拉回，並透過胸腰筋膜連結臀部，增強轉身切入的爆發力。
desc_en: Power source for rebounding and boxing out. Pulls the arm down forcefully to secure the ball. Connects to the glutes via fascia, enhancing torque for explosive spin moves.

img_source: DrJanaOfficial, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 胸前傳球（Chest Pass）與強力切入的主要動力。在防守時負責用胸膛吸收對手撞擊，以及卡位時的手臂內收動作。
desc_en: Primary driver for Chest Passes and powerful drives. Absorbs opponent contact with the chest during defense and powers arm adduction during boxing out.

img_source: colorized by Michael Gasperl, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防守滑步時維持膝蓋穩定的關鍵。協助屈髖以利快速抬腿切入，但若過度緊繃會導致髂脛束摩擦症候群，影響側向移動能力。
desc_en: Crucial for knee stability during defensive slides. Assists hip flexion for quick drives. However, tightness leads to IT Band Syndrome, impairing lateral mobility.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在雙手高舉防守或搶籃板時協助上提肩胛骨。緊張的比賽常導致此肌肉不自覺聳肩僵硬，影響投籃時的肩膀放鬆度。
desc_en: Assists in scapular elevation during hands-up defense or rebounding. High-stress games often cause unconscious shrugging here, negatively affecting shoulder relaxation for shooting.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 轉身過人（Spin Move）與防守滑步的樞紐。控制髖關節外旋與轉動，過度使用易導致梨狀肌症候群，影響下肢爆發力。
desc_en: Pivot point for Spin Moves and defensive slides. Controls hip external rotation and pivoting. Overuse can cause Piriformis Syndrome, hampering lower body explosiveness.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 急停（Stop）與減速的煞車皮。在快速攻防轉換中負責吸收硬地衝擊，預防小腿前側疼痛（Shin Splints）。落地時控制腳掌緩衝。
desc_en: The brake pad for sudden stops and deceleration. Absorbs hard court impact during fast transitions, preventing Shin Splints. Controls foot descent upon landing.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS), CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 腳踝的側向穩定器。在激烈的側向滑步與變向切入時，快速反應以防止腳踝內翻（翻船），是籃球員最容易受傷也最重要的部位。
desc_en: Lateral ankle stabilizer. Reacts instantly to prevent inversion sprains (rolling ankle) during intense lateral slides and cuts. The most vulnerable yet vital muscle for hoopers.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 爆發性跳躍與快攻衝刺的引擎。快縮肌比例高，負責在膝蓋伸直狀態下（如起跑或衝刺跳）產生強大推進力。
desc_en: Engine for explosive jumps and fast break sprints. High fast-twitch fiber content generates powerful propulsion when the knee is extended (sprinting or jumping).

img_source: Par Henry Vandyke Carter, CC0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 空中對抗與拉桿動作（Body Control）的核心。負責在空中維持身體平衡，以及在轉身過人或大力長傳時提供旋轉扭力。
desc_en: Core of mid-air body control and layups. Maintains balance in the air and provides rotational torque for spin moves or powerful full-court passes.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS)[2], CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防守深蹲（Defensive Stance）時防止膝蓋過度鎖死。在快速啟動切入時負責「解鎖」膝關節，允許膝蓋迅速彎曲。
desc_en: Prevents knee locking during defensive stances. 'Unlocks' the knee joint to allow rapid flexion for explosive drives and quick starts.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 垂直起跳與爆發性切入的主發動機。在低位背框單打（Post-up）時提供強大的推擠力量。落地時負責離心收縮以保護膝蓋。
desc_en: Primary engine for vertical jumps and explosive drives. Provides immense pushing power during low-post backing down. Protects knees via eccentric contraction upon landing.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防守滑步與單腳起跳（Layup）的穩定關鍵。防止骨盆傾斜與膝蓋內扣（Knee Valgus），肌力不足是造成籃球員前十字韌帶（ACL）受傷的主因之一。
desc_en: Key to stability in defensive slides and single-leg takeoffs (layups). Prevents pelvic tilt and knee valgus. Weakness here is a primary risk factor for ACL injuries in hoopers.

img_source: Braus, Hermann, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 起跳時負責快速抬腿（屈髖）至胸前。在歐洲步（Euro-step）或跨步上籃時，決定跨步的幅度與爆發力。連接軀幹與下肢的樞紐。
desc_en: Lifts the thigh rapidly (hip flexion) during jumps. Dictates stride length and explosiveness in Euro-steps or layups. The pivot connecting trunk and lower body.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助投籃後的手型維持。在球離手瞬間，確保大拇指自然伸展不干擾球的旋轉路徑。長時間控球後容易疲勞。
desc_en: Maintains hand form after shooting. Ensures the thumb extends naturally upon release without interfering with the ball's rotation. Prone to fatigue after prolonged ball handling.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 單手抓球（Palming）與強力運球的核心肌。位於大魚際區，負責在接觸球的瞬間提供吸震與抓握力。
desc_en: Core muscle for palming the ball and power dribbling. Located in the thenar eminence, it provides shock absorption and grip strength upon ball contact.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責將大拇指轉向掌心，形成穩固的持球架構。在傳球與投籃準備動作中，確保球體被手掌牢牢吸附。
desc_en: Rotates the thumb towards the palm to form a secure ball-handling structure. Ensures the ball is firmly adhered to the hand during passing and shooting preparation.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 深層的垂直起跳動力源。作為最純粹的膝伸展肌，在灌籃起跳或搶籃板的瞬間，提供直接且強力的向上推蹬力量。
desc_en: Deep source of vertical jump power. As a pure knee extensor, it provides direct and forceful upward propulsion during dunks or rebounding takeoffs.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防守滑步時的髖關節穩定器。負責控制大腿外旋，防止在低重心橫向移動時膝蓋內扣，保護關節結構。
desc_en: Hip stabilizer during defensive slides. Controls thigh external rotation, preventing knee collapse during low-center-of-gravity lateral movements.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 變向切入（Crossover）時的煞車輔助肌。協助髖內收與膝屈曲，在大幅度歐洲步跨步時，穩定膝關節內側防止拉傷。
desc_en: Braking assistant during Crossovers. Assists in hip adduction and knee flexion. Stabilizes the medial knee during wide Euro-step strides to prevent strain.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 最強的屈肘肌。在搶下籃板後將球用力「抱死」在胸前（Chinning），防止對手拍球。在身體對抗中維持手臂彎曲的護球姿勢。
desc_en: Strongest elbow flexor. Powers the 'Chinning' motion to lock the ball against the chest after a rebound. Maintains the flexed arm position for ball protection during contact.

img_source: Me, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 單手爆扣（Dunk）時的關鍵抓握肌。確保大拇指能強力扣住球體表面，防止球在空中滑脫。
desc_en: Key gripping muscle for one-handed dunks. Ensures the thumb strongly clamps onto the ball surface, preventing slippage in mid-air.

img_source: Was a bee, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 快攻衝刺時負責勾起大拇指，避免腳尖踢到地板絆倒。在急停跳投落地瞬間，協助控制腳掌的觸地角度。
desc_en: Dorsiflexes the big toe during fast breaks to prevent tripping. Assists in controlling foot contact angle when landing from a pull-up jumper.

img_source: Polygon data were generated by Database Center for Life Science (DBCLS), CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 跳躍落地時的緩衝輔助。負責伸展腳趾並背屈腳踝，在著地瞬間分散衝擊力，減少黑指甲（瘀血）的發生。
desc_en: Cushioning aid during landing. Extends toes and dorsiflexes the ankle, distributing impact forces upon contact to reduce the risk of black toenails.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 高強度全場壓迫防守後的輔助呼吸肌。當疲勞累積時，協助提起肋骨增加進氣量。過度緊繃可能導致投籃手麻木（胸廓出口症候群）。
desc_en: Accessory respiratory muscle after high-intensity full-court press. Lifts ribs to increase air intake during fatigue. Tightness can lead to shooting hand numbness (Thoracic Outlet Syndrome).

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 身體張力指示器。在禁區碰撞或灌籃發力時常不自覺緊咬。學會放鬆咬肌能幫助改善投籃時的身體流暢度。
desc_en: Body tension indicator. Often clenched during paint contact or power dunks. Learning to relax the masseter helps improve shooting fluidity.

img_source: Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 投籃出手後的「跟隨動作（Follow-through）」肌群。負責伸直手指指向籃框，並在接傳球前張開手掌準備。
desc_en: Muscle group for the shooting 'Follow-through'. Extends fingers towards the rim and opens the hand in preparation for catching passes.

img_source: CFCF, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責食指外展。在投籃持球時，幫助調整手指間距以獲得最佳控球手感（Spread fingers）。
desc_en: Abducts the index finger. Helps adjust finger spacing for optimal ball control sensation during the shooting hold.

img_source: CFCF, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責中指外展。協助張開手掌以進行單手抓球或封阻對手視線（Face guarding）。
desc_en: Abducts the middle finger. Assists in spreading the hand for palming or face guarding on defense.

img_source: CFCF, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責無名指外展。在快速運球變向中，微調手指接觸點以改變球的旋轉。
desc_en: Abducts the ring finger. Fine-tunes finger contact points to alter ball spin during rapid dribble moves.

img_source: CFCF, CC BY-SA 4.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責小指外展。最大化手掌跨度，對於手掌較小的球員進行單手控球尤為重要。
desc_en: Abducts the little finger. Maximizes hand span, especially important for players with smaller hands attempting one-handed ball control.

img_source: Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 投籃精準度的最後一哩路。負責食指的獨立伸展，是許多射手最後離開球體的「瞄準指」，決定球的最終方向。
desc_en: The final mile for shooting accuracy. Independently extends the index finger, serving as the 'aiming finger' for many shooters to determine the final ball trajectory.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防守交叉步（Crossover Step）的啟動肌。負責快速屈髖與內收，幫助身體迅速轉向以跟上進攻者的切入。
desc_en: Starter muscle for the defensive Crossover Step. Responsbile for rapid hip flexion and adduction, helping the body pivot quickly to contain driving attackers.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 影響投籃姿勢的潛在殺手。若過度緊繃（圓肩），會限制手臂高舉的流暢度，降低投籃出手點的高度。
desc_en: Potential killer of shooting form. If tight (rounded shoulders), it restricts smooth overhead arm movement, lowering the release point of the shot.

img_source: User:Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 在激烈喘息時穩定喉部。當球員進行全場折返跑後大口呼吸時，協助維持呼吸道的暢通與結構穩定。
desc_en: Stabilizes the larynx during heavy panting. Assists in maintaining airway patency and structural stability when gasping for air after full-court sprints.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 高強度比賽中的換氣輔助。在短暫暫停或罰球時，協助強制呼氣，幫助快速排出二氧化碳以恢復體能。
desc_en: Ventilation aid during high-intensity games. Assists in forced expiration during timeouts or free throws, helping rapidly expel CO2 for recovery.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 快速轉頭觀察全場（Court Vision）的關鍵。負責頸部旋轉，讓控球後衛能迅速確認隊友位置。疲勞時會代償輔助呼吸。
desc_en: Key to rapid Court Vision. Responsible for neck rotation, enabling point guards to quickly scan for teammates. Compensates as a breathing aid during fatigue.

img_source: Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 平衡感測器。在單腳起跳或落地不穩時，微調腳趾抓地力以維持平衡，預防腳趾撞傷（吃蘿蔔）。
desc_en: Balance sensors. Fine-tune toe grip to maintain balance during single-leg takeoffs or unstable landings, preventing toe sprains.

img_source: Image:Gray427.png modified, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 投籃手型的精密調節器。負責彎曲掌指關節同時伸直指間關節，維持投籃時手指「不抓球、僅指腹接觸」的正確空心手勢。
desc_en: Precision regulator of shooting form. Flexes MCP joints while extending IP joints, maintaining the correct 'hollow palm' grip where only fingertips touch the ball.

img_source: Image:Gray427.png modified, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 協助中指維持柔和的觸球感。在運球時防止手指過度僵硬，確保球感（Touch）敏銳。
desc_en: Helps the middle finger maintain a soft touch. Prevents finger rigidity during dribbling, ensuring sensitive ball control (Touch).

img_source: Image:Gray427.png modified, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 輔助控球穩定性。在單手傳球或變向運球時，協調無名指的動作。
desc_en: Aids ball handling stability. Coordinates ring finger movement during one-handed passes or crossover dribbles.

img_source: Image:Gray427.png modified, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 維持小指在投籃輔助手的正確位置。防止小指干擾球的出手路徑。
desc_en: Maintains correct little finger position on the guide hand during shooting. Prevents interference with the ball's release path.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 穩定投籃肩膀的關鍵。負責下壓肩胛骨，防止聳肩，確保手臂能輕鬆舉起並維持穩定的出手點。
desc_en: Key to stable shooting shoulders. Depresses the scapula to prevent shrugging, ensuring the arm raises effortlessly and maintains a consistent release point.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防守姿態的維持者。在張開雙臂防守時，負責肩胛骨後收，避免圓肩導致防守範圍縮小。
desc_en: Maintainer of defensive posture. Retracts scapulae when arms are spread wide for defense, preventing rounded shoulders which would reduce defensive reach.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 運球動作的驅動肌。協助將手掌快速翻轉朝下以控制球的反彈，並在投籃跟隨動作中維持前臂穩定。
desc_en: Driver of dribbling action. Assists in rapidly turning the palm down to control the ball's bounce, and maintains forearm stability during the shooting follow-through.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 運球變向（In-and-out）的關鍵。負責將手掌翻轉朝上/外，做出假動作誘導防守者重心偏移。
desc_en: Key to 'In-and-out' dribble moves. Rotates the palm up/outwards to execute fakes that shift the defender's balance.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 最後一刻的控球防線。負責指尖的屈曲力量，在指尖挑籃（Finger Roll）或極限救球時發揮關鍵作用。
desc_en: Last line of defense for ball control. Provides fingertip flexion power, critical for Finger Rolls or saving loose balls at full stretch.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 運球時的「彈簧手」。提供適度的手指屈曲張力，使手掌能像彈簧一樣吸收並反彈球的動能。
desc_en: The 'spring hand' for dribbling. Provides moderate finger flexion tension, allowing the hand to absorb and rebound the ball's kinetic energy like a spring.

img_source: https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/d/df/Inferior_view_of_tibialis_posterior_muscle_-_animation.gif
desc: 足弓的動態支撐。在歐洲步或側向急停時，抵抗巨大的足外翻力量，保護足踝內側韌帶與關節。
desc_en: Dynamic arch support. Resists massive pronation forces during Euro-steps or lateral stops, protecting medial ankle ligaments and joints.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 轉身過人（Spin Move）的軸心穩定肌。在單腳旋轉時微調股骨頭位置，確保旋轉動作流暢且穩定。
desc_en: Axial stabilizer for Spin Moves. Fine-tunes femoral head position during single-leg pivots, ensuring smooth and stable rotation.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防守滑步的深層穩定器。在雙腳寬站距的防守姿勢下，提供髖關節深層的本體感覺與穩定性。
desc_en: Deep stabilizer for defensive slides. Provides deep hip joint proprioception and stability during wide-stance defensive positioning.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 上籃與投籃時防止手臂外開。協助將手臂保持在身體前方（屈曲與內收），確保投籃手肘不外張（Chicken wing）。
desc_en: Prevents arm flaring during layups and shots. Keeps the arm in front of the body (flexion/adduction), ensuring the shooting elbow stays tucked (no Chicken wing).

img_source: Henry Gray, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 控球時的掌心張力調節。雖非所有人都有，但存在的球員在用力運球時，此肌腱會明顯浮起以拉緊手掌筋膜。
desc_en: Palm tension regulator during ball handling. Though absent in some, for those who have it, the tendon pops up during hard dribbling to tighten the palmar fascia.

img_source: Braus, Hermann, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責食指內收。在投籃準備期，協助將手指併攏調整至舒適的持球寬度。
desc_en: Adducts the index finger. Assists in gathering fingers to a comfortable width during the shooting preparation phase.

img_source: Braus, Hermann, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責無名指內收。協助維持手指的緊湊性，避免在抄截時手指因過度分散而受傷。
desc_en: Adducts the ring finger. Helps maintain finger compactness, reducing injury risk from fingers being snagged during steal attempts.

img_source: Braus, Hermann, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 負責小指內收。在運球時防止小指無力地向外飄移，確保整隻手掌都能有效覆蓋球體。
desc_en: Adducts the little finger. Prevents the pinky from flailing outward during dribbling, ensuring the entire hand effectively covers the ball.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 保護尺神經與血管。在用力運球或手掌撞擊地板（救球）時，收縮手掌內側皮膚提供緩衝保護。
desc_en: Protects ulnar nerve and vessels. Contracts hypothenar skin to provide cushioning during forceful dribbling or palm impact with the floor (saving balls).

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 核心穩定的最底層。在跳躍落地瞬間反射性收縮，支撐骨盆內臟器對抗巨大的垂直衝擊力（G-force）。
desc_en: The floor of core stability. Reflexively contracts upon jump landing to support pelvic organs against massive vertical impact forces (G-force).

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防守時頻繁抬頭與聳肩的副產品。過度使用會導致頸部僵硬，限制轉頭觀察視野（Scanning）的能力。
desc_en: Byproduct of frequent looking up and shrugging on defense. Overuse leads to neck stiffness, restricting the ability to scan the court.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 投籃舉臂的啟動肌。負責手臂外展的前30度動作，並在投籃全程將肱骨頭壓入關節窩，防止脫位。
desc_en: Initiator of the shooting arm raise. Responsible for the first 30 degrees of abduction and compresses the humeral head into the socket throughout the shot to prevent dislocation.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 投籃準備動作（Cocking）的關鍵外旋肌。負責將前臂向後旋轉至垂直位置。投籃後負責手臂的減速煞車。
desc_en: Key external rotator for the shooting 'Cocking' phase. Rotates the forearm back to a vertical position. Decelerates the arm after the shot release.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防守碎步（Stutter Step）的輔助肌。協助快速調整髖部位置與雙腿間距，保持防守重心的靈活性。
desc_en: Accessory muscle for defensive Stutter Steps. Assists in rapid hip and stance width adjustments, keeping the defensive center of gravity agile.

img_source: Berichard, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 急停跳投（Pull-up Jumper）的足底煞車。在最後一步用力踩地時，縮短足底長度提供剛性，將水平動能轉換為垂直動能。
desc_en: Plantar brake for Pull-up Jumpers. Shortens the foot to provide rigidity during the final plant step, converting horizontal momentum into vertical lift.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 籃球員的彈跳核心。負責將大腿快速拉向軀幹（屈髖），決定了垂直起跳時的抬腿速度與高度。緊繃會導致腰痛。
desc_en: The jumper's core. Pulls the thigh rapidly towards the trunk (hip flexion), dictating leg drive speed and height in vertical jumps. Tightness leads to lower back pain.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 空中對抗時的側向穩定器。當球員在空中受到側面撞擊時，保護脊椎不側彎受傷。單腳起跳上籃時防止骨盆下墜。
desc_en: Lateral stabilizer during mid-air contact. Protects the spine from buckling when hit from the side in the air. Prevents pelvic drop during single-leg layups.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 轉身動作（Spin Move）的內在引擎。與對側外斜肌協同工作，產生強大的軀幹旋轉力量，甩開防守者。
desc_en: Internal engine for Spin Moves. Works with the contralateral external oblique to generate powerful trunk rotation, clearing defenders.

img_source: Mongrangvebet, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 空中折疊（Double Clutch）的控制肌。允許球員在空中捲曲身體躲避封蓋，並吸收正面撞擊（Charge）的衝擊力。
desc_en: Control muscle for Double Clutch moves. Allows players to crunch in mid-air to avoid blocks and absorbs impact when taking a Charge.

img_source: modified by Uwe Gille, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 所有爆發動作的基礎。在起跳、切入或身體對抗前預先收縮，增加腹內壓，像舉重腰帶一樣保護脊椎。
desc_en: Foundation of all explosive movements. Contracts before jumps, drives, or contact to increase intra-abdominal pressure, protecting the spine like a weightlifting belt.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 背框單打（Post-up）的支柱。負責維持背部挺直以抵抗身後防守者的推擠。在搶籃板空中挺腰時發揮關鍵作用。
desc_en: Pillar of the Post-up game. Maintains a straight back to resist pushing from defenders behind. Crucial for extending the back in mid-air rebounding.

img_source: Me, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 投籃準備動作（Cocking）的腕部伸展肌。負責將手腕向後扳，儲存彈性位能，為最後的壓腕動作做準備。
desc_en: Wrist extensor for the shooting Cocking phase. Cocks the wrist back to store elastic energy, preparing for the final wrist snap.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 穩定投籃手腕的中心。確保手腕在伸展過程中不左右晃動，維持投籃軌跡的直線穩定性。
desc_en: Stabilizes the wrist center during shooting. Ensures the wrist doesn't wobble laterally during extension, maintaining a straight shooting trajectory.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 高速運球的動力肌。負責手腕的屈曲與外展，在快速變向運球（In-and-out）時控制球的落點。
desc_en: Power muscle for high-speed dribbling. Responsible for wrist flexion and radial deviation, controlling ball placement during In-and-out moves.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 罰球線上的定心丸。透過深層腹式呼吸調節心率與壓力，同時在身體對抗時憋氣提供核心支撐。
desc_en: The stabilizer at the free-throw line. Regulates heart rate and stress via deep abdominal breathing. Provides core bracing via breath-holding during physical contact.

img_source: Henry Vandyke Carter, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 深層頸部穩定肌。在身體頻繁變向與急停時，維持頭部與頸椎的穩定位置，確保視線不劇烈晃動。
desc_en: Deep neck stabilizer. Maintains stable head and cervical spine positioning during frequent cuts and stops, ensuring vision doesn't shake violently.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 上籃護球（Protecting the lay-up）的輔助肌。協助將大腿抬起並外旋（做出像是盤腿的動作），用腿部阻擋防守者接觸身體。
desc_en: Assistant for layup protection. Helps flex and externally rotate the thigh (like crossing legs) to use the leg as a shield against defenders.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 與臀中肌協同，鎖定股骨頭。在單腳轉身（Pivot）時，提供深層的關節穩定，防止骨盆晃動。
desc_en: Works with gluteus medius to lock the femoral head. Provides deep joint stability during single-leg Pivots, preventing pelvic instability.

img_source: BodyParts3D/Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 防守滑步時的內收控制。在雙腿快速開合的過程中，負責將腿部拉回中線，協助快速變換防守位置。
desc_en: Adduction control during defensive slides. Responsible for pulling the leg back to midline during rapid stance changes, aiding quick defensive repositioning.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 肩鎖關節的避震器。在手臂受到劇烈拉扯（如搶球被犯規）時，穩定鎖骨防止關節受傷。
desc_en: Shock absorber for the AC joint. Stabilizes the clavicle when the arm is violently pulled (e.g., hard foul during a loose ball), preventing joint injury.

img_source: User:Mikael Häggström, Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 口腔底部的支撐肌。在劇烈運動缺氧時，協助下顎與舌頭位置的穩定，間接輔助氣道暢通。
desc_en: Support muscle of the mouth floor. Assists in stabilizing jaw and tongue position during hypoxic intense exercise, indirectly aiding airway patency.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 高抬腿切入（High Knee Drive）的動力。與腰大肌協同，負責將大腿強力屈曲，幫助球員在擁擠的禁區中跨步上籃。
desc_en: Power for High Knee Drives. Works with psoas major to forcefully flex the thigh, helping players stride through a crowded paint for layups.

img_source: Anatomography, CC BY-SA 2.1 JP, via Wikimedia Commons
desc: 壓力的儲存庫。關鍵罰球時若過度緊繃（咬牙），會影響專注力與全身放鬆。建議在罰球前透過張嘴放鬆此肌肉。
desc_en: Reservoir of stress. Excessive tightness (clenching) during clutch free throws affects focus and relaxation. Recommend relaxing this muscle by opening the mouth before shooting.
